detaileddescription.para: Save Clothoid list to a stream
Save Clothoid list to a stream
Save the clothoid list on a stream. The data is saved as follows # x y theta kappa x0 y0 theta0 kappa0 x1 y1 theta1 kappa1 ... xn yn thetan kappan
Read the clothoid list from a stream. The data is assumed to be saved as follows # x y theta kappa x0 y0 theta0 kappa0 x1 y1 theta1 kappa1 ... xn yn thetan kappan
Manage a piecewise clothoids $ G(s) $ composed by n clothoids (not necessarily G2 or G1 connected)
